title: Five Points to Choose the Best Charter Flight Service
text:
Five Points to Choose the Best Charter Flight Service Five Points to Choose the Best Charter Flight Service 0 
You must have been aware of Benjamin Franklin's famous quote: Remember that time is money. Of course, time is money. Infact, it is more than money. You can earn money and spend. Can you wind back the clock? No, you cannot. The point here is the lost time is lost you cannot earn it. What you can do is to utilize time in a way that you can feel you are living your life to the fullest. 
Charter flight service has been devised to save time. There may be numerous reasons to look for this service. But, in the core, lies the need of reaching a destination quickly. Be it an urgent business meeting or a family reunion called on a short notice, you can easily find charter plane service at your disposal these days. However, it is not easy to decide which one is better than the rest. And you cannot conduct your due diligence at the moment when you urgently need an air lift. Therefore, it is advisable that you should make a list of good companies offering charter services beforehand so that you can easily avail a charter flight when you need it. Below-mentioned are five points that will assist you in preparing a list of reliable companies: 
You should always consider companies that are Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) authorized. You can ask for FAA documentation to verify it. 
Don't forget to check the insurance of a company. It can offer a great deal of information about the company. 
You should always consider the companies, which are subject to third-party audits. 
Though it is not always possible, visiting the office of a charter flight service provider can provide you with a tremendous amount of information. 
Never forget to check on the pilots. Different jet types need different pilot hours. Usually, each captain should have at least 5,000 total flight hours and 300 hours in a particular aircraft. You can also ask how often pilots get recurrent training in a full motion simulator. 
You should also get quotes from at least 6-7 companies. When you are done with your screening, you should make a list of the top three companies on which you can bank on. Most of the companies working in this domain offer charter flight services for both citizens and cargo. They have corporate air charter planes to meet all the needs of corporate professionals. So, now, what are you waiting for? Avail a charter flight and save you time. The author is a freelance writer.
